commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Revised to be current as of Java SE 8, add test document. Fixes #26.

commits.summary: Ensure variable name is not a reserved word
commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Also do not allow variable name to be a carriage return, fixes #22.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Excludes @Annotation lines from indentNextLinePattern when they are on a line by themselves or are followed by `(`. Fixes #19.

commits.summary: Rewrite grammar to better match spec
commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: This solves several issues with the previous grammar. Also change root scope to longer treat source.java as a parent grammar. Fixes #8 and #23.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Simple require a closing brace at the start of a line to decrease the indent level rather than checking the rest of the line. This improves behavior in if/else cases where braces, etc are placed after the closing brace. Fixes #24.

commits.summary: Copy Fully Qualified Class Name: Add enum support
commits.author: Brad Reynolds

commits.summary: Organize Imports: Remove duplicates from static/nonstatic imports
commits.author: Brad Reynolds

commits.summary: Organize Imports: Prevent error when importing java.util.*
commits.author: Brad Reynolds

commits.summary: Organize Imports: Recognize Annotations as type definitions
commits.author: Brad Reynolds

commits.summary: Fixes to "Create Package Declaration". 1. Corrected escaping issue. 2. Fixed regex that determines the default directory to stop at (e.g. src, tst).
commits.author: Brad Reynolds

commits.summary: Add scoping to allow special treatment of <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>↩</kbd> to between {}
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Do not let () in a comment trigger a method declaration
commits.author: Michael Sheets
Michael Sheets
commits.body: Match comments that happen between the declaration and the opening of the braces.

commits.summary: Change shortcut for 'Organize Imports' to <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌃#</kbd>
commits.author: Curt Sellmer
commits.body: The original shortcut `<kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⇧⌘O</kbd>` conflicts with the shortcut for the 'Open Favorites' dialog.

commits.summary: Match empty braces as increasing indent
commits.author: Allan Odgaard
Allan Odgaard
commits.body: Remove intermediate shell script that checked if we had ‘java’ and ‘javac’. Dependencies on these are now declared in the bundle item’s property list.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.body: This is unnecessary as TextMate.executor already does this, and as the custom code was using Ruby’s Pathname class, anything that was matched as a file, but didn’t exist on disk, would cause an error.

commits.summary: Adding support for .jspf and .tag files as JSP language files.
commits.author: Jacob Swartwood

commits.summary: Change directory to the package root folder before compiling
commits.author: Thomas Brus

commits.summary: Added syntax highlighting for annotations within method parameters.
commits.author: Tyler Coville
